Description: Painted pottery shabti with a black braided lappet-wig, a yellow face with black and white eyes and red ears and mouth, a yellow, red and black collar enclosing the joined yellow hands in relief; the body is white, the front of the leg section is inscribed with a column of black painted hieroglyphs(very worn) on a yellow ground, the back is decorated with a representation of a red and yellow seed-basket, the rest of the body is decorated with red and yellow representations of mummy-wrappings.
